query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Io era già da quell’ ombre partito, 2 e seguitava l’orme del mio duca, 3 quando di retro a me, drizzando ’l dito,
query.error: **English:** 1 I had already departed from those shadows, 2 and was following the footsteps of my guide, 3 when behind me, pointing his finger,
query.result: 1 Aham api tataḥ tamaḥbhyaḥ pravṛttaḥ āsīt, 2 Eva ca anugacchataḥ āsīt mama netāram, 3 Yatra mama paścāt, anguliṃ nirdiśya,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 una gridò: «Ve’ che non par che luca 5 lo raggio da sinistra a quel di sotto, 6 e come vivo par che si conduca!».
query.error: **English:** 4 someone cried out: "See how the ray from the left 5 does not seem to shine on the one below, 6 and how he seems to conduct himself as if alive!"
query.result: 4 Ekaḥ akrośat: "Paśya, na iva prakāśate 5 Vāma-dig-gataḥ raśmiḥ adhastāt sthitena, 6 Jīva iva ca ātmānam nayati!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 Li occhi rivolsi al suon di questo motto, 8 e vidile guardar per maraviglia 9 pur me, pur me, e ’l lume ch’era rotto.
query.error: **English:** 7 I turned my eyes at the sound of this utterance, 8 and saw him watching with wonder 9 only me, only me, and the light that was broken.
query.result: 7 Śabdasya asya śrutvā cakṣuṣī pratyavartayam, 8 Tam ca adbhutena paśyantam adṛkṣam, 9 Mātram mām, mātram mām, ca bhinnam prakāśam ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 «Perché l’animo tuo tanto s’impiglia», 11 disse ’l maestro, «che l’andare allenti? 12 che ti fa ciò che quivi si pispiglia?
query.error: **English:** 10 "Why is your spirit so entangled," 11 said the master, "that it slows your progress? 12 What makes you heed the whispering here?
query.result: 10 "Kimartham tava cittaṃ tathā viṣaṃjñam," 11 āha guruḥ, "yad yānam tava mandīkṛtam? 12 Kim kārayati tvām yat tatra kaṇakaṇāyati?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 ché sempre l’omo in cui pensier rampolla 17 sovra pensier, da sé dilunga il segno, 18 perché la foga l’un de l’altro insolla».

query.result: 16 yasmāt sarvadā puruṣaḥ yasya manasi vikāraḥ 17 vikārāt paraṃ, sa svataḥ lakṣyam tirohitam karoti, 18 yataḥ tat-tat-pravṛttiḥ parasparam viṣaṃyojayati."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 Che potea io ridir, se non «Io vegno»? 20 Dissilo, alquanto del color consperso 21 che fa l’uom di perdon talvolta degno.
query.error: **English:** 19 What could I say in reply, except "I am coming"? 20 I said it, somewhat sprinkled with the color 21 that sometimes makes a man worthy of forgiveness.
query.result: 19 Kim aham punar abhāṣitum śaknuye, vinā "Aham āgamiṣye" iti? 20 Uktvā, alpaśaḥ kṣiptaḥ tena varṇena 21 yaḥ kaścid puruṣaṃ kṣamāyogyam karotīti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 E ’ntanto per la costa di traverso 23 venivan genti innanzi a noi un poco, 24 cantando ‘Miserere’ a verso a verso.
query.error: **English:** 22 And meanwhile, along the hillside, 23 a little ahead of us, 24 people were coming toward us,
query.result: 22 Tataśca tīrasya pārsvataḥ 23 āgaman naraḥ asmākam agre alpameva, 24 gāyantaḥ "Miserere" padyaṃ padye.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Quando s’accorser ch’i’ non dava loco 26 per lo mio corpo al trapassar d’i raggi, 27 mutar lor canto in un «oh!» lungo e roco;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 e due di loro, in forma di messaggi, 29 corsero incontr’ a noi e dimandarne: 30 «Di vostra condizion fatene saggi».
query.error: **English:** 28 and two of them, in the form of messengers, 29 ran to meet us and asked us: 30 "Tell us about your condition."
query.result: 28 tataś ca dvau tau dūtābhyām iva rūpeṇa 29 āgacchataḥ āvābhyām prati, āvaṃ ca papracchataḥ: 30 «Yathāsti tathaiva ātmīyām sthitim ācaṣṭam».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 31 Evaṃ ca mama guruḥ: "Yuyaṃ pradhāvitum śaknutha 32 tathaiva ca varṇayitum śaknutha tebhyaḥ ye yūyaṃ preraṇakartṛbhyaḥ 33 yataḥ asya puruṣasya śarīram satyamāṃsamasti."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 34 Yadi tasya chāyāṃ draṣṭum tiṣṭhanti, 35 yathāhaṃ manye, tatraiva teṣāṃ pratyuttaram sampūrṇam asti: 36 pūjayantu tam, sa ca teṣāṃ priyaḥ syāt."

query.prompt:

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 «Questa gente che preme a noi è molta, 44 e vegnonti a pregar», disse ’l poeta: 45 «però pur va, e in andando ascolta».
query.error: **English:** 43 "These people who press upon us are many, 44 and they come to pray to you," said the poet: 45 "but still go, and listen as you go."
query.result: 43 Ete janāḥ ye asmān āyānti bahutvāt, 44 tvām ca prārthayitum āgacchanti, iti kavir uvāca: 45 tathāpi gaccha, gacchan ca śṛṇu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 46 "He jīva yaḥ gacchasi sukham anubhavitum 47 taiḥ eva aṅgaiḥ yaiḥ sambabhūva", 48 āgacchantaḥ krandantaḥ, "alpaṃ viśrāmaṃ kuru."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
